:root{--colorPrincipal:#328cc1;--colorSecundario:#0b3c5d;--colorOscuro:#1d2731;--resaltar:#d9b310}*{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box}html{font-size:10px}body{background-color:#f5f6f0;color:#020f14;font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;text-align:center;font-size:1.4rem;height:100vh}h1{font-size:2.6rem}h2{font-size:2.4rem}.piePagina{left:0;bottom:0;width:100%;background-color:var(--colorOscuro);color:#fff;text-align:center;padding:10px 10px 3px;font-size:1.1rem;-webkit-clip-path:circle(55px at 50% 100%);clip-path:circle(55px at 50% 100%);transition:all .6s}.piePagina-info{padding-top:11px}.seccionCabecera{background-color:var(--colorSecundario)}.cabecera-container{width:100%;padding:10px}.cabecera-container li{list-style:none}.cabecera-container a{text-decoration:none;color:#f5f5f5}.cabecera-container a:hover{text-decoration:underline;color:var(--resaltar)}.contenedorRedesSociales{padding-top:15px}.contenedorRedesSociales li{display:inline-block;padding-right:6px}.contenedorRedesSociales img{width:24px;transition:transform .2s}.cabecera-logo{font-size:2.6rem;padding:8px}.cabecera-itemsLogeo{font-size:1.3rem}.cabecera-itemsNavegacion li{text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700;line-height:20px}.inicioSeccion{padding-top:20px;padding-bottom:20px;width:75%;margin:auto}.formulario{width:100%;padding-top:20px}.formulario-inputs input{width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;height:30px;margin-bottom:12px}.seccionPolitica{font-family:Times New Roman,Times,serif;font-size:1.2rem}.seccionPolitica-aceptar{padding-top:15px;padding-bottom:15px}.btn{color:#fff;background-color:var(--colorSecundario);border-radius:3px;font-size:12px;padding:10px 20px;border:none;cursor:pointer}.carrusel{width:100%}.tarjeta-list{align-items:center;height:304px;padding:10px 0;margin:0 auto;max-width:90vw;overflow:hidden}.tarjeta-list,.tarjeta-track{position:relative;display:flex}.tarjeta-track{top:0;left:0;justify-content:center;transition:.5s ease-in-out}.tarjeta{position:relative;width:275px;padding:0 18px;float:left;box-sizing:border-box;display:flex;height:100%}.tarjeta a img{-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover;width:100%;border-radius:4px;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5);transition:.3s ease-in-out}.tarjeta-arrow{border-radius:30px;background-color:#fff;position:absolute;z-index:4;width:48px;height:48px;text-align:center;box-shadow:0 2px 5px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.15);border:0;cursor:pointer;font-size:30px}.tarjeta-prev{left:0}.tarjeta-next{right:0}.bannerEmpresa{background-color:var(--colorPrincipal);color:#fff;box-shadow:0 8px 20px -4px #11131a}.bannerEmpresa-bloque{padding:15px;border-top:1px dotted #fff}.centrarLista{text-align:center}.centrarLista,.justificarLista{list-style-position:inside;padding-top:5px;padding-bottom:5px}.justificarLista{text-align:justify}.piePagina-itemsNavegacion li{text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:700;line-height:20px}.piePagina-itemsNavegacion a{text-decoration:none;color:#fff}@media (min-width:768px){.cabecera-container{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}.cabecera-container div:first-child{order:3}.cabecera-itemsLogeo li,.cabecera-itemsNavegacion li{display:inline-block}.cabecera-itemsLogeo li:not(:first-child):before,.cabecera-itemsNavegacion li:not(:first-child):before{content:"|";color:#f5f5f5}.bannerEmpresa-franja{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}.bannerEmpresa-bloque{border:none;border-right:1px dotted #fff}.contenedorLibros{display:grid;-moz-column-gap:25px;column-gap:25px;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}.contenidoRegistro{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 2fr;align-content:center}.piePagina{display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center}.piePagina-itemsNavegacion li{display:inline-block}.piePagina-itemsNavegacion li:not(:first-child):before{content:"|"}.piePagina :first-child{order:1}.piePagina :nth-child(2){order:3}.piePagina :nth-child(3){order:2}.piePagina-info{margin-left:-240px}.contenedorLectura{width:95%;display:grid;-moz-column-gap:15px;column-gap:15px;grid-template-columns:1fr 2fr .7fr;align-content:center}}@media (min-width:900px){.contenedorLibros{display:grid;-moz-column-gap:25px;column-gap:25px;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr}}
